statements: UPDATE InventoryTransactions SET quantity_change = 10, transaction_type = 'IN' WHERE transaction_id = 123

UPDATE InventoryAuditTrail SET user_id = 5, action_taken = 'Updated quantity' WHERE audit_id = 3;

UPDATE InventoryAuditTrail SET action_taken = 'Quantity updated to 20', user_id = 1234, audit_date = '2022-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE audit_id = 5001;
UPDATE StockAdditions SET quantity_added = 15, added_by_user = 'John Doe' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE StockTransfers SET destination_location = 'Warehouse B', transfer_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE transfer_id = 201;
UPDATE StockTransfers SET destination_location = 'Warehouse', quantity_transferred = 50 WHERE transfer_id = 1001;
UPDATE StockAdjustments SET quantity_adjusted = 15, reason = 'Damaged products', adjusted_by_user = 'Admin' WHERE adjustment_id = 2001;
UPDATE stock_additions SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_name = 'Monitor';
UPDATE transfers SET quantity = quantity + 10, from_location = 'Warehouse A', to_location = 'Store B' WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE stock_additions SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE transfers SET to_location = 'Warehouse B', quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE product_name = 'Product B' AND from_location = 'Warehouse A';
UPDATE StockProducts SET unit_price = 15.99, quantity_on_hand = 100 WHERE product_id = '1e94e51e-821a-467b-b6a3-4ecbfaeda10f';

UPDATE StockTransactions SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE transaction_type = 'OUT'
UPDATE StockAdditions SET quantity_added = CASE WHEN added_by = 'Admin' THEN quantity_added + 5 ELSE quantity_added - 2 END WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
